title.content-text: 1.2.3 - Switch Features in a Hierarchical Network

brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts Core Layer switch features.

Network Topology: Same as Diagram 1. Switches C1 and C2 are identified as Core Layer.
Core Layer switch features include Layer 3 support, a very high forwarding rate, Gigabit Ethernet, 10 Gigabit Ethernet, redundant components, link aggregation, and Q o S.
